sections.MISSION: is to maintain elite standards of precision through rigorous tryouts, selecting individuals with exceptional marksmanship and unwavering discipline to contribute to the success of military operations.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Assess candidates' physical fitness for operational readiness
Evaluate soldier skills and knowledge proficiency
Scrutinize candidates' character traits for cohesion
Assess ability to quickly retain new knowledge
sections.END STATE:
Strategic selection of highly qualified personnel, enhancing the unit's reconnaissance capabilities and ensuring optimal operational effectiveness.
Training Objectives
Conduct ACFT
Conduct iron sight grouping exercise
Conduct day/night land nav
Conduct Tactical PT
Conduct knowledge tests
Conduct KIMS exercise
Conduct interviews
Evaluate and select candidates
